inclusion.criterion: Absence of chromosomal abnormalities and associated anomalies
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Gestational age at the time of the procedure will be between 16 0/7 weeks and 25 6/7 weeks
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Increased risk for preterm labor including short cervical length (<1.5 cm)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of BPH and multiple urological procedures, but is currently stable with good urine output.
